name: Love Note
description: A love note that gets passed around, lovers must write at least x amount of notes in the Love Note to win the game.

name: Tattle
description: Tattle on the lovers for passing notes in the classroom. If tattle is successful, the lovers are sent to detention and Tattle Tale wins the game.

name: Absent
description: You weren't at school! The teacher doesn't believe the tattle tale. This card can be played by each student only once.

name: Pass Direction
description: Every student must pass their lowest card to the direction displayed. If 'Opposite Day' card has been played, the direction changes to the opposite direction.

name: Trade Snacks
description: Pick a student to give you their lowest card, you may give them any card in your hand in exchange.

name: Nosy Glance
description: A good day to be nosy, pick a student to peek at the cards in their hands.

name: Cupid
description: Cupid has come from above! Everyone must select the lowest card in their hand and place it in the middle. Lovers can swap a card in their hand for any student's card. The lovers cannot see the card they choose.

name: Opposite Day
description: It's opposite day! Once this card is played, the direction of the Pass Direction card is now opposite.

name: Graffiti
description: Someone mischevious has scribbled out a note from the love note. The love note loses a note.
